pageContext.claim: “@Merck Pharma is a leader in higher & higher drug prices while at the same time taking jobs out of the U.S. Bring jobs back & LOWER PRICES!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump attacked Merck because its chief executive quit one of his CEO panels after the president's remarks on Charlottesville. But Merck actually has a relatively good record on drug prices. It is one of only a handful of big pharmaceutical companies to disclose the amount Merck actually receives for a drug after factoring in rebates and other discounts that drugmakers pay out.
